content: In the third quarter of Fiscal 2022, sales to Nokia are $1.9 million or 24% of revenues compared to $2.8 million or 42% of revenues, in the same period a year ago, and $1.9 million or 23.8% of net revenues in the prior quarter. We reported a net loss of $4.6 million or $0.19 per diluted share on net revenues of $8.1 million for the third quarter of Fiscal 2022, compared to a net loss of $5.2 million or $0.22 per diluted share on net revenues of $6.8 million for the third quarter of Fiscal 2021, and a net loss of $4.6 million or $0.19 per diluted share on net revenues of $7.8 million for the second quarter of Fiscal 2022.
